results.name: Rodeway Inn Adelanto Us 395
results.description: The Rodeway Inn at Adelanto upholds the Western pillars of hospitality and comfort for every guest who walks through our doors. Our friendly and accommodating staff go above and beyond to make your stay enjoyable and relaxing, whether you are visiting for business or pleasure. Our hotel is located off of the Highway 395 and is conveniently located in central heart of the region- minutes away from Apple Valley, Victorville, Hesperia, Big Bear, and Las Vegas. Experience our high-quality amenities including spacious and inviting accommodations equipped with high-speed internet, satellite TV, microwave, refrigerator, vanity mirror, hair dryer, and iron/ironing board, along with an on-site laundry facility. Start your day off right by enjoying our delicious, complimentary continental breakfast. Our expansive amenities and superior service will meet the needs of each guest. We hope you enjoy your stay with us!
results.address: 11625 Lawson Ave State Highway 395, Adelanto, CA 92301-1924

results.name: California Inn Hotel and Suites
results.description:
See why so many travelers make California Inn Hotel and Suites their hotel of choice when visiting Adelanto. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Rooms at Adelanto Days Inn offer air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A 24 hour front desk is one of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Days Inn Adelanto, free parking is available.
Given the close proximity to Mavericks Stadium (1.7 mi), guests of Days Inn Adelanto can easily experience one of Adelanto's most popular landmarks.
When you're feeling hungry, be sure to check out La Botana Mexican Restaurant and Bravo Burgers, which are some Mexican restaurants that are popular with locals and out-of-towners alike.
If you're looking for things to do, you can check out El Mirage Lake, which is a popular park amongst tourists.
We're sure you'll enjoy your stay at California Inn Hotel and Suites as you experience all of the things Adelanto has to offer.

results.name: Rodeway Inn Victorville I-15
results.description: Location Hotel Victorville Mojave Dr is a charming hotel in Victorville, San Bernardino, CA Off of Highway 15. The property is close to tourist attractions like Victorville Soccer League, United Methodist Church, Old Town Victorville Veterans Memorial, St Joan of Arc-Catholic Church, and California Route 66 Museum. Special Features The reception is welcoming. The rooms here are well-designed. The property is built in a large area. The guests can take a walk around the hotel and enjoy some fresh air. The bathrooms are attached to the rooms. Facilities The rooms here are equipped with AC, king-sized beds, and TV. The property provides modern amenities like wheelchair accessibility, and parking facility. CCTV cameras ensure the security of the guests. Free Wi-Fi is also available here. Nearby The property is close to eateries such as Molly Browns Country Cafe, Diamond Panda, Hometown Buffet, Tokyo Sushi & Bar Bq, and Fruit Avenue.

results.name: Economy Inn Victorville
results.description:
Looking for a place to stay in Victorville? Then look no further than Economy Inn Victorville, a motel that brings the best of Victorville to your doorstep.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Economy Inn Victorville offer a refrigerator and air conditioning.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
When you're feeling hungry, you can check out The Corner Cafe (0.6 mi), Sushi Aru (0.6 mi), or Tokyo Sushi & Bar B Q (0.9 mi), which are all within walking distance of Economy Inn Victorville.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular history museums such as The California Route 66 Museum.
We're sure you'll enjoy your stay at Economy Inn Victorville as you experience everything Victorville has to offer.

results.name: Days Inn by Wyndham Victorville
results.description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Victorville, Rodeway Inn is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its budget friendly environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Rodeway Inn makes it easy to enjoy the best of Victorville.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Rodeway Inn offer air conditioning.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk. Guests of Rodeway Inn are also welcome to enjoy a pool, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
While you're here, be sure to check out some of the diners, including Emma Jean's Hollandburger Cafe, Molly Brown's Country Cafe, and Richie's Real American Diner, all of which are a short distance from Rodeway Inn.
During your visit, be sure to check out The California Route 66 Museum (1.2 mi), which is a popular attraction within walking distance of the hotel.
Whether you're traveling for business, pleasure or both, Rodeway Inn is sure to make your visit to Victorville one worth remembering.

results.name: Holiday Inn Victorville, an IHG Hotel
results.description: The Holiday Inn Victorville is conveniently located right off Hwy 15 which will give you easy access to your destination.  Our excellent service and great amenities will help you relax if you are on business or pleasure.  If you are here on business we are minutes from Southern California Logistics Airport, FedEx, and Boeing to name a few.   If you are looking for fun we are located near Big Bear Resort, Route 66 Museum, and Apple Valley Golf Club.  Our non-smoking hotel features refrigerators in every room along with 42-inch flat panel HDTV.  Our business center is available 24 hours and stay connected with our free Wi-Fi.  Take advantage of our complimentary fitness center, and then relax in our Olympic size swimming pool. If you need to host a business meeting or celebrate a birthday we have 10,000 sq. ft. of meeting space with catering available.  Start and end your day in our Restaurant serving American Cuisine with vegetarian options available.

results.name: Shady Oasis Kampground
results.description: Plenty of shady sites gives Shady Oasis it's name, and makes it a great place to stop after a long day of driving through the high desert. We are a short distance to such places as Disneyland and Hollywood, and provide full hookup sites as well as tent sites, and cabin rentals. There is plenty on site to keep you busy such as volleyball, horseshoes, a swimming pool and a rec room; or go for a walk along the riverbed or hike in the nearby hills.

results.name: Green Tree Inn
results.description:
Finding an ideal budget friendly hotel in Victorville does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Green Tree Inn & Extended Stay Suites, a nice option for travelers like you.
You'll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer air conditioning and a kitchenette, and you can stay connected during your stay as Green Tree Hotel offers guests free internet access.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk. Plus, Green Tree Inn & Extended Stay Suites offers a pool and an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
While in Victorville be sure to experience local burritos favorites at Paulina's Mexican Grill.
If you're looking for things to do, you can check out The California Route 66 Museum, which is a popular history museum amongst tourists.
Green Tree Inn & Extended Stay Suites puts the best of Victorville at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

results.name: GT Hotels Inn & Suites
results.description: Located in Victorville, GT Hotels Inn & Suites is in the city center and next to a golf course. This Hotel is well known for its economical room rates affordable to for any traveler who's passing by on the Road to Las Vegas or Los Angeles. With a direct location right off the I-15 Freeway on Palmdale Rd it couldn't be easier to pull in and get some rest! Cable TV is featured in all rooms. Simply furnished, each room is equipped with tea and coffee-making facilities. Executive rooms are ground floor and also offer an iron with ironing facilities.

results.name: Victorville
results.description: Come enjoy our beautiful non-smoking desert location! Red Roof Inn Victorville is just minutes from the San Bernardino Fairgrounds, Route 66 Museum and Mohave Narrows Park. Calico Ghost Town and Victor Valley College are also nearby. For skiers and snowboarders, Big Bear Lake and Wrightwood Ski Resort are just 45 minutes away! The hotel is a short drive from Southern California Logistics Airport, Mojave Narrows Park, Calico Ghost Town, Auto Club Speedway, Maverick Stadium, Big Bear Lake, Wrightwood Ski Resort and the Mall of Victorville and many stores and restaurants. Red Roof Inn Victorville features all non-smoking guest rooms, free Wi-Fi, a free expanded cable package featuring HBO, conference room, suites, microwave and mini-refrigerator in all guest rooms, a coin laundry facility and an elevator. A $50.00 refundable deposit is required for all cash paying guests at check-in, provided that no damage is done to room. We ask a $50 refundable deposit on cribs for all cash paying guests at check-in, refundable once the crib is returned. One well-behaved family pet per room is welcome at Red Roof Inn Victorville.

results.description: The Hilton Garden Inn Victorville hotel in California is conveniently located in the Heart of the High Desert just 30 minutes from the Ontario International Airport, two hours from Los Angeles International Airport and the Beach, and three hours from Las Vegas.
